# Swiss HIV Cohort Study

The RETUNE study is conducted within the Swiss HIV Cohort Study. The Swiss HIV Cohort Study is nation-wide, long standing providing the infrastructure and framework for the RETUNE study.

[![](images/shcs_logo%20Kopie.jpg){fig-align="center" width="426"}](http://www.shcs.ch)

# Funding

RETUNE is an investigator initiated clinical trial sponsored by the University Hospital Basel. RETUNE is funded by the **Swiss Tobacco Control Fund** (Federal Office of Public Health), the **Novartis Foundation for Medical-Biological Research** and by the **Swiss National Science Foundation**.
